text: Bella and the Bulldogs is an American sitcom airs on Nickelodeon. The series Premiered January 17, 2015. On March 4, 2015, Nickelodeon ordered a second season. ==Plot== The series follows Bella, a cheerleader who lives in Texas. Her life changes when she becomes the new quarterback for her school football team, the Bulldogs. ==Cast== ===Main characters=== * Brec Bassinger as Bella Dawson * Coy Stewart as Troy * Jackie Radinsky as Sawyer * Buddy Handleson as Newt * Lilimar Hernandez as Sophie * Haley Tju as Pepper ===Recurring characters=== * Rio Mangini as Ace McFumbles * Dorien Wilson as Coach Russell * Annie Tedesco as Carrie Dawson == Series overview == == Episodes == === Season 1 (2015) === === Season 2 (2015â€“16) === ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:Nickelodeon television series Category:Teen television series Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:English-language television programs
title: Bella and the Bulldogs
